title.firstLine: You deserve a space that is

design_consultation.title: DESIGN CONSULTATION
design_consultation.description: Struggling to make choices in your design, and want support? Resolve all doubts with us!

room_design.title: ROOM DESIGN
room_design.description: Wondering how to achieve your style and maximize your space? Let's create your dream home!

room_design_premium.title: ROOM DESIGN - PREMIUM
room_design_premium.description: Not sure where to even start? We'll help you visualize your future home with ease!

busy_student_room.title: BUSY STUDENT ROOM
busy_student_room.description: Bedroom, office, and music room - can everything fit comfortably in 8m²

elegant_living_room.title: ELEGANT COZY LIVING ROOM
elegant_living_room.description: Relaxing and natural feeling, right in the comfort of home. Could it work in your space?

sophisticated_reception.title: SOPHISTICATED RECEPTION
sophisticated_reception.description: Clean and sophisticated, but welcoming reception area. Your guests will feel right at home!

subtitle2.title: What to expect?
subtitle2.li1: We'll require pictures of your space, as well as a current floor plan with measurements. Don't worry, this can be a digital drawing, or just sketched by you!
subtitle2.li2: In the initial videocall, we'll discuss the issues you have in the space, as well as your needs and wants for the design.
subtitle2.li3: After receiving the design documents via e-mail, you'll have a chance to discuss the designer's choices in a final videocall, and ask for revisions if needed. Or maybe you'll decide you'd like another service too!

contact_us.title: CONTACT US
contact_us.subtitle: Do you have any questions, or would you like a different service? Let us know!

design_consultation.p1: You have ideas, but need a little push in the right direction? Maybe you're not sure your vision will turn out how you imagine it? Or you'd like to consult about pet-friendly materials, and durable finishes? Then this is the service for you!

list.li1: 60 min video call for general advice and suggestions for your space(s).
list.li2: Everything done/shown in the call, will be sent to you via email (quick sketches and moodboards, links viewed together, list of commented materials and finishes, etc.)
list.li3: Additional after-call deliverables are not included.

subtitle.li1: The price of the 60 min consultation with the designer is 40€.
subtitle.li2: You will receive a link via e-mail to schedule the call.
subtitle.li3: You can provide photos, floor plans and additional comments, but it is not necessary.

room_design.p1: Not sure what furniture to buy and how to decorate your space? Struggling to find your style? We can help you adapt the layout, functionality and aesthetic of your space, to reflect your unique personality!

list.li1: 30 min video call to understand your space, style, and functional needs
list.li2: Space planning (floor plan with suggested furniture size and placement)
list.li3: A moodboard for the space with client’s style (suggested furniture pieces, color palette, materials, finishes, lighting fixtures)
list.li4: Taking into account accessibility needs, adaptations for children and pets

subtitle.li1: Please provide photos and the floor plan (can be official, or sketched by you).
subtitle.li2: The price starts at 100€ and depends on the size and function(s) of your space.
subtitle.li3: You will receive an e-mail with the price for your room(s), and a link to schedule the introductory meeting when you book the service.
